name: Surfing Pixels
description:
Surfing pixels is an endless runner with retro graphics. Tap the screen and invert the gravity before the platform ends. Survive as long as you can in differrennt challenging gamemodes. Climb to the top of the global leaderboards or try to beat the highscores of your friends.

Main Features:

🎮 Easy to learn, hard to master gameplay 

❤️ Multiple unlockable Gamemodes 

🏁 Unlock Skins by doing different challenges 

✅ NO In-App Purchases 

🏆 Online Leaderboards

Download Surfing Pixels now for free!

If you run into a problem, please contact us at chrispgamedevelopment@gmail.com with as much information as possible on the issue.
